attributes.action: Hold a general election in February 2021
attributes.additional_details:
The best way to save the economy (which also  pays for the nhs) is to save jobs, save business and save people’s futures. 

We need a general election as soon as possible. January or February 2021
attributes.background: The country is being run in to the ground. Businesses are being destroyed. Jobs gone forever. Mental health issues on the rise. We need to change course and the only way to do this is to vote out those making these disastrous decisions.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
